name: Jerskin Fendrix
description:
'''Joscelin Dent-Pooley''' (born {{circa|1995}}), professionally known as '''Jerskin Fendrix''', is an English composer and musician. He is best known for composing the scores to the feature films, ''[[Poor Things (soundtrack)|Poor Things]]'' (2023), ''[[Kinds of Kindness|Kinds of Kindness]]'' (2024) and ''[[Bugonia (film)|Bugonia]]'' (2025) â€“ all of which where were directed by [[Yorgos Lanthimos]].

In addition to his soundtrack work, Fendrix has released two solo studio albums, ''Winterreise'' (2020) and ''Once Upon a Time in Shropshire'' (2025), alongside one live album, ''Live at Cafe OTO'' (2021).
